data.eml:eml: This dataset is the databased part of the Lepidoptera from the entomological collections of the Musée des Confluences (Lyon). It comprises Hesperiidae and Pieridae belonging to the Poulard's and Branger's collections, from Martinique (French West Indies). Mr Gwenaël David (Association Martinique Entomologie) identified the specimens and the results have been published in 2017.
